Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were maintained in DMEM media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing wild-type LRRK2 showed higher tolerance to H2O2-induced cell death.
Cells expressing G2019S mutant did not confer protection against H2O2-induced cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: At least 2–3 independent experiments were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment contained at least 6–8 replicates in each experimental condition.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with pCDNA3.1 vector were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and post hoc Fisher’s protected least significant difference(PLSD) tests
